recommendations_for_future_enhancement.rationale: Many conspiracy events involve coordinated actions by multiple perpetrators that cannot be adequately represented by binary relations
recommendations_for_future_enhancement.expected_benefit: Enhanced pattern detection and conspiracy network visualization
